dict.acceptation: 热心的；热情的；热烈的；狂热的；

sent.orig: Reports from gunnery officers were more enthusiastic than those of Fighter Command.
sent.trans: 来自枪炮长的报告要比战斗机飞行员的热情的多。

sent.orig: Enthusiastic and hospitable people in Mata Lake welcome you.
sent.trans: 热情好客的马踏湖区人民欢迎您！

sent.orig: We are greatly appreciated of the vast concern and support from students, enterprises and enthusiastic people.
sent.trans: 对于长期以来关注、支持我们的同学、企业及热心人士，我们在此深表感谢。

sent.orig: The era of China's enthusiastic learning from the West is clearly waning.
sent.trans: 显而易见，中国满腔热情学习西方的时代行将结束。

sent.orig: Old and new customers alike, enthusiastic and thoughtful service, door-door service door.
sent.trans: 新老客户一视同仁，服务热心周到，送货上门，服务上门。
